sentences.sContent: He just laughed and dismissed my proposal as unrealistic.
sentences.sCn: 他只是笑了笑，认为我的建议不切实际，拒绝考虑。

sentences.sContent: Bryant was unfairly dismissed from his post.
sentences.sCn: 布赖恩特被无理免职了。

remMethod.val: dis(分开) ＋ miss(送， 放出) → 解雇

trans.tranOther: to refuse to consider someone’s idea, opinion etc, because you think it is not serious, true, or important
